data.description: A mobile app for parents to monitor their children's time at school.
features: Real-time tracking of the student's attendance at school
Receive notifications when the student arrives and leaves the school premises
View a detailed attendance history to track daily, weekly, and monthly attendance
Set up geofences for the school area for added security
Integration with the school's schedule and timetable
Secure access and authentication for parents
Support for multiple students in the same family
In-app messaging to communicate with the school administration
